name: FreightWaves
desc: Data aggregator on the transportation industry.
top_tickers: Digital Momentum (SIGNAL), Intermodal Rates (INTRM), Operating Ratio (OR), Outbound Containers by Market (ORAIL53L), Tender Rejection Rates by Market (OTRI), Tender Volumes by Market (OTVI), Truckload Rates (DATVF)
full_sector_coverage: Transportation (truckload, intermodal, air cargo, maritime, warehousing)
pricing_structure: Pricing is based on company size. A single truck driver will pay less than a large 3PL.
why_us?: This is the most comprehensive, near-time data in the industry, updated daily.
advantages: Most transportation data is months old by the time users can see it, making it almost useless for making quick decisions. Most of our data is updated daily, giving users faster insights into the industry around them.
use_cases: To recognize the overall health of the transportation industry by looking at the amount of freight being imported/exported to/from the US as well as between various markets. Users can also see how a variety of factors such as weather, trade negotiations, overall economic health, driver "shortage," and many other things affects the transportation industry.
